definition[0]: a curved mass on the surface of something, usually caused by something under or inside it
example[0]: The gun made a bulge under his jacket.
definition[1]: a sudden temporary increase in the amount or level of something
definition[2]: to stick out in a rounded shape, especially because something is very full or too tight
example[2]: His pockets were bulging with candy.
example[3]: He fell heavily to the floor, his eyes bulging wide with fear.
